attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My sugestion is to ban the sale of fireworks to the general public, and limit them to the sale of appropriately trained and regognised organisers only. Not only would this make it a safer place to be "fireworks can be dangerous, unfortunately each year around a thousand people are injured by fireworks in Britain" (quote from HSE web Site), but also prevent fireworks being let off at random times of the day & night,by anti-social individulas causing distress to both us and animals.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Saynotofireworks/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
